lst.name: sentence
lst.str: But he said that despite Argentina's "disciplined effort" to achieve inflation-free economic growth, it was unable to obtain IMF payouts due to the link between that arrangement and settlement of a separate agreement with creditor banks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sourrouille stated flatly that the banks were flouting a long-established practice under which debtor countries which reached agreements on economic reforms with the Fund were a good credit risk for the banks.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sourrouille reminded the Interim Committee that the IMF last February approved a 1.3-billion-dlr stand-by loan and a longer-term credit, known as an extended Fund Facility for another 500,000 dlrs.
